MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone, affecting properties in The Beeches and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:16PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:33pm on Sunday, 13th December 2020.
